verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: continued] [ARG1: his attack on special counsel Robert Mueller] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-MNR: with a tweet quoting his former lawyer John Dowd] .
Donald Trump continued his attack on special counsel Robert Mueller on Wednesday with [ARG0: a tweet] [V: quoting] [ARG1: his former lawyer John Dowd] .
